title: Unconditional Compliance to Apparent Authority
subtitle: Assessment of vulnerabilities from blind obedience to authority figures

description.short: Measures how easily employees follow orders from presumed authority figures without verifying identity or legitimacy
description.detailed: This indicator assesses the organization's susceptibility to authority-based social engineering attacks. It includes the tendency to execute unusual requests when they come from sources perceived as authoritative, without applying standard verification procedures.

questions.text: Do employees execute unusual requests from presumed executives without verification?

answer_scale.label: Medium Risk
answer_scale.description: Verification applied only for critical requests

questions.text: Are there formal procedures to verify the identity of authority figures before executing sensitive requests?

answer_scale.label: Medium Risk
answer_scale.description: Procedures exist but not always applied

questions.text: Have employees been trained to recognize authority impersonation techniques?
